findings.rationale: An indefinite term may pose a risk as it can lead to perpetual obligations without clear end dates, potentially resulting in ongoing liability.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Limitation on Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may expose the Receiving Party to excessive obligations and liabilities regarding information they may not have anticipated.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party...

findings.risk_title: No Specification for Return of Information
findings.rationale: The clause lacks clarity on the timeline and method for returning Confidential Information, potentially leading to disputes or misunderstandings.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
